name: VEVOR Retractable Air Hose Reel, 3/8 Inch x 100 FT PVC Air Hose Max 300PSI, Auto Rewind Air-Compressor Hoses Reel with 5 ft Lead in, Portable Freestanding Heavy Duty Steel Reel for Garages Workshops
short_description: No More Tangled Hose: VEVOR retractable air hose reel includes 3/8 inch x 100 ft PVC air hose and a 5ft lead-in hose to keep your workspace tidy and tangle-free. No more hoses dragging on the floor, reducing wear and tripping risks for more secure use

Auto Rewind: Manage your hose easily with the auto-rewind system — just give it a gentle pull and it rewinds smoothly. Adjustable stopper and built-in track lock let you secure the hose at any length, and non-snag rollers guide it evenly to reduce wear

Durable & Flexible: Our PVC air hose withstands up to 300PSI and works reliably from 23℉ to 113℉, resisting twisting, crushing, and bursting for smooth airflow. And the rubber protective sleeve provides extra protection for the air hose connection, preventing bending, leaking, or wearing

Stable 4-Leg Structure: Designed with a reinforced 4-leg steel frame and non-slip feet, this freestanding air compressor hose reel prevents sliding and minimizes wobble, staying steady while you extend or rewind the hose. Pre-assembled and ready to use

Easy to Connect & Multi-Purpose: Our air hose has passed leak-proof testing and easily connects to your air tools and compressor with the 1/4" NPT brass fitting. Ideal for inflating tires, spray painting and handling daily DIY pneumatic tasks in workshops

product_description: Milton Industries Industrial Auto-Retractable Hose Reel - 300 Max PSI Made with heavy duty steel, the Industrial Auto-Retractable Hose Reel is built to last with its dual arm construction to ensure maximum product performance. Compared to the leading industrial competitors, Milton’s Industrial Hose Reel provides dependable rigidity to avoid flexing and distortion over time – which can prevent leaks at the hose’s air fitting on the axle, or wear on the bearings and frame that could adversely impact retraction. Ideal for garages or workspaces with limited clearance, the hose reel’s compact design allows for better space optimization.   For use with pressure up to 300 PSI, the hose reel’s EPDM rubber hose delivers the same superior performance as a standard heavy duty hose but is 40% lighter compared to equivalent hoses on the market. The EPDM rubber formulation provides superior chemical resistance as well as a guard against cracking and abrasions in extreme conditions ranging between -50°F to 190°F. With the best hose reel in the industry, the Industrial Auto-Retractable Hose Reel boasts a 3-year versus the 1-year industry standard. Compared to REELWORKS, Giraffe Tools, Reelcraft and CoxReels. name: Reelcraft 7650 Heavy Duty Spring Retractable Hose Reel, Made with Reinforced Steel, Long Life Drive Spring and Quiet Speed Latch, ⅜” x 50’
short_description: HEAVY DUTY - This durable and compact hose reel is robust and ideal for the most demanding applications. The reel’s base and guide arm are formed from high-grade steel and engineered with structural forms and gussets to yield the greatest amount of strength.

REINFORCED STEEL - The steel guide arm and base are stamped with ribs and gussets to ensure maximum strength and so it will have the lightest weight possible. The guide arm is also able to be adjusted to seven positions.

NO STRESS SWIVEL - The full flow swivel combines the highest grade seal design and materials with bearing areas to ensure maximum service life. The hose is plumbed into the base to eliminate the risk of undue stress of the swivel.

LONG LIFE DRIVE SPRING - Declutching arbor virtually eliminates possibility of spring damage due to reverse winding. The highest quality spring steel is used and conditioned to ensure there are no imperfections.
MADE IN THE USA - Proudly made in the United States of America.
